00004 #ifndef _EXCEPTIONS_H
00005 #define _EXCEPTIONS_H
00006 
00007 //
00008 //  Define a set of exceptions for use by the analysis programs
00009 //
00010 
00011 #include <string>
00012 #include <iostream>
00013 #include <exception>
00014 #include <stdexcept>
00015 
00021 class AnalysisException : public std::runtime_error {
00022  public:
00023     AnalysisException( std::string str ): std::runtime_error(str) {;}
00024 };
00025 
00029 class CriticalAnalysisException : public AnalysisException {
00030     
00031  public:
00032     CriticalAnalysisException(const std::string &str)
00033         : AnalysisException(str) {;}
00034 
00035 };
00036 
00037 
00041 class MildAnalysisException : public AnalysisException {
00042     
00043  public:
00044     MildAnalysisException(const std::string &str)
00045         : AnalysisException(str) {;}
00046 
00047 };
00048 
00052 class EOFException : public MildAnalysisException {
00053 
00054  public:
00055     EOFException(const std::string &str)
00056         : MildAnalysisException(str) {;}
00057     
00058 };
00059 
00060 
00064 class RangeException : public MildAnalysisException {
00065 
00066  public:
00067     RangeException(const std::string &str, int code=0)
00068         : MildAnalysisException(str) {;}
00069     
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif
